tuv.seg: The European Council defines the EU's overall political direction and priorities
Déanann an Chomhairle Eorpach treo agus tosaíochtaí foriomlána polaitiúla an AE a shainiú
It is not one of the EU's legislating institutions, so it does not negotiate or adopt EU laws
Níl an Chomhairle i measc institiúidí reachtaithe an AE, mar sin, ní dhéanann siad dlíthe an AE a idirbheartú nó glacadh leo
The European Council is also responsible for defining strategic guidelines for the area of freedom, security and justice
Tá an Chomhairle Eorpach freagrach, chomh maith, as sainmhíniú a thabhairt ar threoirlínte straitéiseacha do limistéar na saoirse, na slándála agus an cheartais
The members of the European Council are the heads of state or government of the EU member states, the European Council President and the President of the European Commission
Cinn stáit nó rialtais bhallstáit an AE, Uachtarán na Comhairle Eorpaí agus Uachtarán an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh atá i gcomhaltaí na Comhairle Eorpaí
The EU’s High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy also takes part when foreign affairs are discussed
Anuas air sin, glacann Ardionadaí an AE don Chomhbheartas Eachtrach agus Slándála páirt, chomh maith, nuair a dhéantar plé ar ghnóthaí eachtracha
European Council meetings are essentially summits where EU leaders meet to decide on broad political priorities and major initiatives

Cruinnithe mullaigh atá i gcruinnithe na Comhairle Eorpaí, go bunúsach, áit a gcasann ceannasaithe an AE ar a chéile chun cinneadh a dhéanamh ar thosaíochtaí fairsinge polaitiúla agus ar thionscnaimh mhóra
The Council meets at least twice every 6 months in Brussels
Casann an Chomhairle ar a chéile ar a laghad dhá uair gach 6 mhí sa Bhruiséil
Meetings are chaired by the European Council President
Bíonn Uachtarán na Comhairle Eorpaí ina chathaoirleach ar na cruinnithe
The President of the European Parliament attends the start of each meeting, to outline the European Parliament's views
Freastalaíonn Uachtarán Pharlaimint na hEorpa ar thús gach cruinnithe, chun cuntas a thabhairt ar thuairimí Pharlaimint na hEorpa
Other people, such as the President of the European Central Bank, may be invited to attend meetings, depending on the issues being discussed
Féadtar cuireadh a thabhairt do dhaoine eile, ar nós Uachtarán an Bhainc Cheannais Eorpaigh, chun freastal ar chruinnithe, ag brath ar na saincheisteanna atá á bplé
The European Council mostly takes its decisions by consensus
Déanann an Chomhairle Eorpach a gcuid cinntí, den chuid is mó, trí chinntí comhthola
However, in certain specific cases outlined in the EU treaties, it decides by unanimity or by qualified majority
Ar a shon sin, i gcásanna ar leith áirithe a dtugtar cuntas orthu i gconarthaí an AE, déanann siad cinneadh trí aontoilíocht nó trí thromlach cáilithe
If a vote is taken, neither the European Council President nor the Commission President takes part
Má chaitear vóta, ní ghlacann Uachtarán na Comhairle Eorpaí ná Uachtarán an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh páirt
The European Council has a formal role to play in the EU's annual European semester process
Tá ról foirmiúil le comhlíonadh ag an gComhairle Eorpach i bpróiseas sheimeastar bliantúil Eorpach an AE
This is the EU's yearly cycle of economic and fiscal policy coordination
Timthriall bliantúil an AE de bheartais gheilleagracha agus fhioscacha a chomhordú is ea seo
At its annual March meeting, the European Council assesses both the economic situation in the EU and progress towards the Europe 2020 targets
Ag a gcruinniú bliantúil i Márta, déanann an Chomhairle Eorpach measúnú ar an gcás geilleagrach san AE agus ar dhul chun cinn i dtreo spriocanna an Eoraip 2020
It then gives policy orientations on fiscal, economic and structural reforms
Cuireann siad seisiúin tionscnaimh bheartais ar bun, ina dhiaidh sin, ar athchóirithe fioscacha, geilleagracha agus struchtúracha
At its June meeting, the European Council endorses the final country-specific recommendations, which set out priorities for each member state for the next 12-18 months

Ag a gcruinniú i mí an Mheithimh, formhuiníonn an Chomhairle Eorpach na moltaí deiridh a bhaineann go sonrach le tíortha, ina leagtar amach tosaíochtaí do gach ballstát do na chéad 12-18 mí amach rompu
Further information on the European Council is available on the europa.eu website
Tá fáil ar thuilleadh faisnéise ar an gComhairle Eorpach ar láithreán gréasáin europa.eu
